name: Stem Cell Extract™ Rice Callus
description: Stem Cell Extract™ (rice callus) is a revolutionary cosmetic ingredient boasting anti-inflammatory, antioxidant, restoring, and whitening properties. Leveraging cutting-edge technologies in cosmetic ingredients, this extract finds its applications in personal care, specifically in beauty and skincare products. Unveil the power of Stem Cell Extract™ Rice Callus for a rejuvenated and radiant complexion.
